sentences.en: And there was Mary Magdalene, and the other Mary, sitting over against the sepulchre.
sentences.cn: 有抹大拉的马利亚 、 和那个马利亚在那里 、 对著坟墓坐著.

sentences.en: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre.
sentences.cn: 2看见石头已经从坟墓辊开了.

sentences.en: In the sepulchre there by the sea ? In her tomb by the sounding sea.
sentences.cn: 在海边那儿的石 墓穴 里,在涛声回响的海边墓室里.

sentences.en: Men and brethren, let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David, that he is both dead and buried, and his sepulchre is with us unto this day.
sentences.cn: 弟兄们，先祖大卫的事，我可以明明的对你们说，他死了，也葬埋了，并且他的坟墓，直到今日还在我们这里。

sentences.en: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple, and came to the sepulchre.
sentences.cn: 3彼得和那门徒就出来, 往坟墓那里去.

sentences.en: So they went, and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone, and setting a watch.
sentences.cn: 他们就带著看守的兵同去 、 封了石头 、 将坟墓把守妥当.

sentences.en: Their quiver is as an open sepulchre, they are all mighty men.
sentences.cn: 耶5:16他们的箭袋、是敞开的坟墓 、 他们都是勇士.

sentences.en: There laid they Jesus, and rolled a great stone to the door the sepulchre and departed.
sentences.cn: 他们将耶稣放在那里, 又滚了一块大石头放在坟墓的门口.

sentences.en: Will be the dome of a vast sepulchre.
sentences.cn: 将是那巨大陵墓的穹顶.

words.tran_cn: 阴森森的；坟墓的，丧葬的
坟墓；圣体安置所（等于Easter sepulchre）

trans.tran_cn: 坟墓，圣体安置所（等于Easter sepulchre）
trans.tran_en: A sepulchre is a building or room in which a dead person is buried
